Date: Friday, 6/2/1990
Subject: Playing time
I'd like to complain about my playing time, I think
I am a pretty good player, so why am I not
a regular in your lineups?

Regards,
Tony Fernandez



Date: Saturday, 6/3/1990
Subject: My role in this team
Sir,
I believe that I am deserving more than being a reliver.
I want a spot in the rotation, I think
I would do an adequate job. Otherwise, I'd like to play
elsewhere!

Regards,
Bryn Smith



Date: Tuesday, 6/6/1990
Subject: Promotion Day
Dear Sir,
Congratulations, our fan interest increased slightly because
our team won on a promotion day. Good job!

Sincerly,
Your PR Director



Date: Wednesday, 6/7/1990
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Greg Brock

I am really enjoying playing for your team.
I would be interested in a contract extension!
How about you?

Regards,
Pascual Perez
